comments: I\'m not sure why everybody gave him such good reviews. The accelerated class is awful. A paper plus conferences every week (ontop of your other classwork. His paper directions on content are always vague yet he is full of critiques. Clear directions=Clear papers. He does not give clear directions yet excepts perfection.
GREAT teacher! WOW cannot describe it in words. He is super helpful, fun and conferences are a piece of cake, and you learn a lot! TAKE HIM, he is truly one of the best.
As long as you do the work and participate in the conferences i do not see how it is possible to get below an A.

John Foust is a very understanding person he will help you and any way shape or form. I would recommend his class to anyone. Yes, he follows the syllabus to the T but he will work with you if you fall behind it is no reason you should get less than a B. GREAT PROFESSOR

Professor Foust is very nice and helpful. I enjoyed taking his class and I would take another course with him. Attendance was mandatory because was an online and you must participate on a weekly basis, as with most online courses. I am not sure what my grade is yet but I scored well on all assignments. I would recommend others to take his class. :)
Very Good Profesor I had him Fall 08 at AAFB.
